page.title: 13Ecology.Plant life.
page.content: In the same area described on page 12 the dry sandstone wall between the path and the cultivated pea-field has disintegrated considerably and is overgrown with grass and plants. Higher up the path the wall has been repaired with plaster and is well covered with ivy-leaved toadflax.The wall had patches of grey and green lichen and moss,indicating a pollution-free area. Plants along the verges included dandelion,pineapple mayweed, honeysuckle,dog rose,bramble, elder-flower,plantain,hop-trefoil, bird's-foot trefoil,hedge-parsley, silverweed,goat's-beard,speedwell, broad-leaved willowherb,nipplewort, and chickweed.
